instructions_to_main_agent: THEME: Strict Light Mode. Do not implement Dark Mode unless explicitly requested by toggle, but default to Light.
LAYOUT: Use a 'Split Screen' or 'Bento Grid' layout. Avoid standard single-column flows.
TYPOGRAPHY: Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (H1-H3) to give that prestigious academic feel. Use 'Manrope' for body text.
COLOR: Use 'Cambridge Blue' (#8EE8D8) sparingly as an accent (lines, buttons, highlights). The main palette should be White, Off-White (#FAFAF9), and Slate-900.
PUBLICATIONS: Do not use cards. Use a clean, dense 'Data List' layout with year on the left and details on the right.
IMAGES: Use the provided 'Fluid Dynamics' image as a subtle artistic element, not just a background. Maybe mask it into a shape.
NAVBAR: Sticky, glassmorphism, with a very subtle 1px border bottom.
FOOTER: Minimalist, large typography for 'Get in Touch'.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (text color change or subtle lift).
Avoid 'Inter' for headings. Use the specified 'Playfair Display'.
Keep the design 'Airy' - use py-24 or py-32 for section spacing.
